resources.string: You can only share one Collection with your Starter plan
To share unlimited Collections, go to the Admin Console on the Web App and upgrade your account.
You have reached the Collection sharing limit for the Starter plan.
To share unlimited Collections, go to the Admin Console on the web app and upgrade your account.
You can still edit and share this collection. To share unlimited Collections, go to the Admin Console on the web app and upgrade your account.
Unlimited Collection sharing is only available for Business plans
Collection sharing is only available for your Starter plan admin
Collection sharing is only available for your Starter plan admin
Contact your admin to upgrade and share unlimited Collections.
